description:
We all want to build a website that sells.

But if you're building a website that looks good but isn't helping you build an email list or sell, then you're leaving money on the table.

Your website is your most important property on the web – so powerful that without a website you cannot achieve your business goals of generating traffic, leads and most importantly making sales.

Now you don't have to be building a complicated expensive website for you to achieve your goals. You can simply build a powerful website with Wordpress and a key marketing tools and tips.

In this course I will teach you exactly that, how to build a website with Wordpress that sells.
title: Wordpress for Marketers – Build a Website that Sells
